card.text: FlyingAt the beginning of your upkeep, return target Spirit card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has vigilance.Whenever equipped creature dies, if it was a Human, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.Equip {2}

card.text: {T}: Add {W}.

card.name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
card.text: Flying, vigilance, indestructibleOther permanents you control have indestructible.

card.name: Balefire Dragon
card.text: FlyingWhenever Balefire Dragon deals combat damage to a player, it deals that much damage to each creature that player controls.

card.name: Barter in Blood
card.text: Each player sacrifices two creatures.

card.name: Battleground Geist
card.text: FlyingOther Spirit creatures you control get +1/+0.

card.name: Blazing Torch
card.text: Equipped creature can't be blocked by Vampires or Zombies.Equipped creature has "{T}, Sacrifice Blazing Torch: Blazing Torch deals 2 damage to any target."Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Bloodflow Connoisseur
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodflow Connoisseur.

card.name: Bloodline Keeper
card.text: Flying{T}: Create a 2/2 black Vampire creature token with flying.{B}: Transform Bloodline Keeper. Activate only if you control five or more Vampires.

card.name: Lord of Lineage
card.text: FlyingOther Vampire creatures you control get +2/+2.{T}: Create a 2/2 black Vampire creature token with flying.

card.name: Bonds of Faith
card.text: Enchant creatureEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.

card.name: Brimstone Volley
card.text: Brimstone Volley deals 3 damage to any target.Morbid — Brimstone Volley deals 5 damage instead if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Bump in the Night
card.text: Target opponent loses 3 life.Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Butcher's Cleaver
card.text: Equipped creature gets +3/+0.As long as equipped creature is a Human, it has lifelink.Equip {3}

card.name: Cackling Counterpart
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Demonmail Hauberk
card.text: Equipped creature gets +4/+2.Equip—Sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Devil's Play
card.text: Devil's Play deals X damage to any target.Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Diregraf Captain
card.text: DeathtouchOther Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.Whenever another Zombie you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Divine Reckoning
card.text: Each player chooses a creature they control. Destroy the rest.Flashback {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Doomed Traveler
card.text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Drogskol Captain
card.text: FlyingOther Spirit creatures you control get +1/+1 and have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Elder Cathar
card.text: When Elder Cathar dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If that creature is a Human, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Faithless Looting
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard two cards.Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Falkenrath Aristocrat
card.text: Flying, hasteSacrifice a creature: Falkenrath Aristocrat gains indestructible until end of turn. If the sacrificed creature was a Human, put a +1/+1 counter on Falkenrath Aristocrat.

card.name: Falkenrath Noble
card.text: FlyingWhenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Feeling of Dread
card.text: Tap up to two target creatures.Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Fiend Hunter
card.text: When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature.When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Forbidden Alchemy
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Forge Devil
card.text: When Forge Devil enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to you.

card.name: Galvanic Juggernaut
card.text: Galvanic Juggernaut attacks each combat if able.Galvanic Juggernaut doesn't untap during your untap step.Whenever another creature dies, untap Galvanic Juggernaut.

card.name: Garruk Relentless
card.text: When Garruk Relentless has two or fewer loyalty counters on him, transform him.0: Garruk Relentless deals 3 damage to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to him.0: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

card.name: Garruk, the Veil-Cursed
card.text: +1: Create a 1/1 black Wolf creature token with deathtouch.−1: Sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.−3: Creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Geist of Saint Traft
card.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)Whenever Geist of Saint Traft attacks, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

card.name: Ghoulraiser
card.text: When Ghoulraiser enters the battlefield, return a Zombie card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Gnaw to the Bone
card.text: You gain 2 life for each creature card in your graveyard.Flashback {2}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Griselbrand
card.text: Flying, lifelinkPay 7 life: Draw seven cards.

card.name: Gutter Grime
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, put a slime counter on Gutter Grime, then create a green Ooze creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of slime counters on Gutter Grime."

card.name: Haunted Fengraf
card.text: {T}: Add {C}.{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Haunted Fengraf: Return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Havengul Lich
card.text: {1}: You may cast target creature card in a graveyard this turn. When you cast it this turn, Havengul Lich gains all activated abilities of that card until end of turn.

card.name: Havengul Runebinder
card.text: {2}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Zombie creature you control.

card.name: Hollowhenge Scavenger
card.text: Morbid — When Hollowhenge Scavenger enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, you gain 5 life.

card.name: Huntmaster of the Fells
card.text: Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or transforms into Huntmaster of the Fells, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token and you gain 2 life.At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Huntmaster of the Fells.

card.name: Ravager of the Fells
card.text: TrampleWhenever this creature transforms into Ravager of the Fells, it deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and 2 damage to up to one target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ravager of the Fells.

card.name: Immerwolf
card.text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)Each other creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf gets +1/+1.Non-Human Werewolves you control can't transform.

card.name: Increasing Ambition
card.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, instead search your library for two cards and put those cards into your hand. Then shuffle.Flashback {7}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Invisible Stalker
card.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)Invisible Stalker can't be blocked.

card.name: Kruin Outlaw
card.text: First strikeAt the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Kruin Outlaw.

card.name: Terror of Kruin Pass
card.text: Double strikeWerewolves you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Terror of Kruin Pass.

card.name: Lingering Souls
card.text: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Mayor of Avabruck
card.text: Other Human creatures you control get +1/+1.At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Mayor of Avabruck.

card.name: Howlpack Alpha
card.text: Each other creature you control that's a Werewolf or a Wolf gets +1/+1.At the beginning of your end step, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Howlpack Alpha.

card.name: Mist Raven
card.text: FlyingWhen Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Moonmist
card.text: Transform all Humans. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures other than Werewolves and Wolves. (Only double-faced cards can be transformed.)

card.name: Murder of Crows
card.text: FlyingWhenever another creature dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

card.text: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.text: FlyingWhenever another non-Spirit creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.text: Whenever Selhoff Occultist or another creature dies, target player mills a card.

card.text: Flying, hexproofSpells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.

card.name: Skirsdag High Priest
card.text: Morbid — {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. Activate only if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Snapcaster Mage
card.text: FlashWhen Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Somberwald Sage
card.text: {T}: Add three mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

card.text: Create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach for each creature card in your graveyard.Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Create a 2/2 blue Homunculus creature token, then sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Stromkirk Captain
card.text: First strikeOther Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1 and have first strike.

card.name: Séance
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, you may exile target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Tragic Slip
card.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Traitorous Blood
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains trample and haste until end of turn.

card.text: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Vampiric Fury
card.text: Vampire creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Vessel of Endless Rest
card.text: When Vessel of Endless Rest enters the battlefield, put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.{T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Young Wolf
card.text: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Zealous Conscripts
card.text: HasteWhen Zealous Conscripts enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.
